-- | Mapping between Aeson's JSON and Bson objects.
--   
@package AesonBson
@version 0.2.2


-- | Convert JSON to BSON and the other way around.
--   
--   Note that BSON has more data types than JSON, so some BSON to JSON
--   conversions are not bijective and somewhat arbitrary.
--   
--   This means that for some BSON objects:
--   
--   <pre>
--   bsonify . aesonify /= id
--   bsonifyValue . aesonifyValue /= id
--   </pre>
--   
--   We tried to choose sensible translations on those cases.
module Data.AesonBson

-- | Converts a BSON document to an AESON object.
aesonify :: Document -> Object

-- | Converts a BSON value to JSON.
aesonifyValue :: Value -> Value

-- | Converts an AESON object to a BSON document.
bsonify :: Object -> Document

-- | Converts a JSON value to BSON.
bsonifyValue :: Value -> Value


-- | Provides <tt>ToJSON</tt> instances for BSON <tt>Value</tt>s and
--   <tt>Document</tt>s.
module Data.AesonBson.Instances
instance ToJSON Document
instance ToJSON Value
